response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be well above $1,200,000. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your organization, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also maximizing the return for us. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any information you need to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1500000}
